body:
Note that this will still keep a ref for `this` because the callback is closured on `this` - I'm not sure if by "inline", @msujaws meant using an attribute, which I think would also work, ie:

```js
fhrPref.setAttribute("onchange", `document.getElementById("optOutStudiesEnabled").disabled = Services.prefs.getBoolPref("${FHR_UPLOAD_ENABLED_PREF}")`);
```

But as noted earlier, I'm probably overly paranoid. If this works on a debug build when exercised in a test, and doesn't show up as leaking, I think we're good.
